column2: he was a nice man with some tatto on his right hand.I didn't read his tatto.I was guessing It was saying" Drink my beer and sleep". He was from Seattle. Starbucks coffee might be better in such a cold city
column4: we have to drink beer. He served great beer.Next time
column5: i will bring my pillow and blanket in order to drink a lot of his beer and sleep at his bar!
